alert.note: Alert for Inland Harris; Montgomery (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 4:13PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN MONTGOMERY AND NORTHEASTERN HARRIS COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM CDT... At 413 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near The Woodlands, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Southwestern Conroe, Humble, Tomball, Jersey Village, Pinehurst, Aldine, Kingwood, Spring Branch North, The Woodlands, Greater Greenspoint, Spring, Spring Branch West, northwestern Northside / Northline, Oak Ridge North, Shenandoah, Magnolia, Stagecoach, Woodloch, Bush Intercontinental Airport, and The Woodlands Pavillion. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
